mapper.select: /* 로그인 시 아이디, 비밀번호, 권한 조회 */ SELECT ui.user_id AS userId, ui.user_pw AS userPw, ui.user_name AS userName, ui.level_code AS levelCode, ui.level_name AS levelName FROM user_info AS ui WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_info (user_id, user_pw, user_Name, level_code, level_name, user_gender, career_check, freelancer_check, user_addr, user_email, user_phone, user_join_date, grade_fee_code, user_grade, total_score, report_score) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userPw}, 'level_code002', '일반회원', #{userGender}, #{careerCheck}, #{freelancerCheck}, #{userAddr}, #{userEmail}, #{userPhone}, CURDATE(), 'grade_fee_code001', '브론즈', 0, 0);
mapper.select: SELECT IF(COUNT(u.user_id) > 0, 1, 0) FROM user_info AS u WHERE u.user_id = #{userId};
